exam.question: An organization needs to migrate specialized workloads to the cloud while maintaining their existing complex licensing and architecture. What Google Cloud solution should the organization use?

A.answer: Compute Engine

D.answer: Cloud Function

exam.question: A travel agency wants to seamlessy share their social media content with partners. What should the organization use?

A.answer: A NoSQL database

D.answer: An application programming interface (API)

exam.question: An organization wants to transform multiple types of structured and unstructured data in the cloud from various sources. The data must be readily accessible for analysis and insights. Which Cloud data storage system should the organization use?

A.answer: Relational database

D.answer: Data warehouse

exam.question: An organization wants to use all available data to offer predictive suggestions on their website that improve over time. Which method should the organization use?

A.answer: Data automation

D.answer: Multiple regression

exam.question: After rolling out new update, an organization found a minor bug in its online video game. How should the organization approach this bug while following SRE principles?

A.answer: Accept and learn from the bug because failure is normal

B.answer: Accept and ignore the bug because it is only minor

C.answer: Hold a postmortem to reprimand the employere responsible for the bug

D.answer: Document bug correction to eliminate all future bugs

exam.question: Why do organizations often struggle to scale their on-premises application infrastructure?

A.answer: Scaling compute instances could breach compliance and/or regulation

B.answer: Increasing compute capacity is time-consuming and costly

C.answer: Their serverless compute functions struggle to meet the demand

D.answer: Their multi-cloud architecture is complex and expensive

exam.question: An organization wants to use Big Query data analytics to understand their website performance but wants to move only some data into the cloud. Which environment should the organization use?

A.answer: Private Cloud

D.answer: Hybrid cloud

exam.question: What is logging within the context of cloud technology?

A.answer: Writing application and operating system events as text

C.answer: Tracking source code across an organization

D.answer: Recording infrastructure and hardware expenditure

exam.question: How does Cloud SQL help organizations create business insights?

A.answer: Integrates with business intelligence and analytics platforms

B.answer: Generates predictions using machine learning models

C.answer: Generates real-time charts and intelligent analytics

D.answer: Transform business data from unstructured to structured

exam.question: An organization recently launched a virtual customer support agent, generating vast amounts of text and speech data. Why should they use a cloud data warehouse to interpret this data?

A.answer: To natively visualize both types of data using a dashboard in real time

B.answer: To ingest and analyze structured and unstructured data at scale, in real time

C.answer: To secure data transmission between cloud and on-premises environments

D.answer: To transform data from structured to unstructured

exam.question: An organization wants to add a new function to their application. They want to write the code and let the public cloud provider handle the infrastructure. Which infrastructure solution should they use?

A.answer: Virtual machines

D.answer: Container Registry

exam.question: An organization wants to leverage tooling and automation as part of its new DevOps philosophy. Which operational challenge will this resolve?

A.answer: Repetitive manual tasks that hinder workflows

D.answer: Defective technical equipment that limits innovation

exam.question: An organization needs to store structured, semi-structured and unstructured data in its raw, native format in the same repository. Which cloud data management solution should the organization use?

A.answer: Data field

D.answer: Data warehouse

exam.question: An organization  wants its users to validate a series of new features for their app. Why should they use App Engine?

A.answer: Because their app is containerized and enable by microservices

B.answer: Because the updated app will only include new features

C.answer: To run different versions of the app for different users

D.answer: To run different versions of the app for the same user

exam.question: How would an organization benefit from using Looker?

A.answer: Optimal identify and access management

D.answer: Advanced business intelligence and analytic

exam.question: An organization delivers a proactive healthcare service. They want to efficiently and automatically collect pacient data. What should the organization encourage the pacients to do?

A.answer: User at-home health screening devices and then upload their health data daily

B.answer: Wear Internet of Things (IoT) devices that upload their health data in real time

C.answer: Self-assess their health data and then document and upload it in real time

D.answer: Visit a nurse who will use the Internet of Things (IoT) devices to collect and upload their health data

exam.question: How would a global organization benefit frmo managing their data with Cloud Spanner?

A.answer: Cloud Spanner is optmized for cold storage

B.answer: Cloud Spanner replicates data across regions in real time

C.answer: Cloud Spanner is optmized to ingest unstructured data

D.answer: Cloud Spanner visualizes and analyzes data in real time

exam.question: An employee receives an email from their internet service provider asking for their bank account number and password. What cybersecurity threat is this?

A.answer: Ransomware

D.answer: Phishing

exam.question: An organization wants to move from a tactical cloud adoption approach to a transformational approach. How should they adapt the way they lead the organization?

A.answer: Increase top-down visibility and foaster a culture of blamelessness

B.answer: Shift an operational expenditure model to capital expenditure

C.answer: Drive cloud adoption with an individual contributor focus

D.answer: Invest in on-premises infrastructure to redesign relationships between IT and employees

exam.question: Why is data stored in Google Cloud secure and private?

A.answer: Data is encrypted by the Security Command Center

B.answer: Data is encrypted by Cloud Data Loss Prevention

D.answer: Data is encrypted when an appropriate tag is applied

exam.question: An organization wants to use multiple marketing datasets to forecast user acquisition. How should they use cloud technology to gain new insights from the data?

A.answer: Import the datasets into a custom data warehouse, and then archive old data

B.answer: Import and selectively archive the datasets in a custom data lake

C.answer: Separate the datasets and make predictions using machine learning

D.answer: Combine the datasets and make predictins using machine learning

exam.question: An organization wants to collect metrics and metadata from their cloud applications and put them into dashboards. Which Google Cloud tool should they use?

A.answer: Cloud Monitoring

D.answer: Cloud Debugger

exam.question: A manager wants to review Google Cloud data access among their employees. Who is responsible for defining data access policies?

A.answer: Cloud Identify

D.answer: Their organization's end users

exam.question: An organization has decided to modernize their applications in the cloud to keep up with their customer's needs. What may have prompted this business decision?

A.answer: Their on-premises applications only autoscale to meet demand

B.answer: They want to change from a pay-as-you-go model to a capital expenditure model

C.answer: Their source code changes erroneously without developer interaction

D.answer: Their on-premises applications take months to update and deploy

exam.question: An organization needs to categorize a large group of photographs using pre-trained machine learning. Which Google Cloud product or service should the organization use?

A.answer: Vision API

D.answer: Looker

exam.question: An organization provides a loyalty program for its customers. It recently partnered with other businesses so that customers can get loyalty points at a range of other stores. Why should the organization use application programming interfaces (APIs)?

A.answer: To migrate all partner data for disaster recovery

B.answer: To analyze and publish loyalty program statistics to a dashboard

C.answer: To personalize recommendations for loyalty card users

D.answer: To connect third-party systems to ensure up-to-date information

exam.question: How do out-of-box APIs make artificial intelligence and machine learning more accessible for all Google Cloud customers?

A.answer: They don't require technical specialists

B.answer: They don't require data input and validation

D.answer: They all require custom training models

exam.question: An organization finds that the amount of cash in their vending machines doesn't match the value ot items sold. They have decided to upgrade their vending machines with cloud-based mobile payment systems. How Could the organization benefit from this upgrade?

A.answer: They could relax data access permissions

B.answer: They could reduce their error budget overspend

C.answer: They could improve their perimeter security

D.answer: They could view data history to see transactions

exam.question: A food delivery service needs access to real-time menu information from all partner restaurants. They also need to share customer order information with the restaurants in real-time. What should the organization use?

A.answer: Site realiability engineering (SRE)

D.answer: A multi-regional database

exam.question: An organization is planning to create may new applications and needs a system for managing and orchestrating their containers. Why should they use Google Kubernets Engine?

A.answer: It enables rapid application deployment and testing

C.answer: It connects legacy systems to an application

D.answer: It provides pre-written source code for application development
